text: Cartman, I thought all you wanted was a Haibo doll!

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: Yeah, but not if you guys have one, too! Now it's worthless and gay! God-damnit I'll never try to be nice again!

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: Well, all in all, I have to say this was a pretty special Christmas.

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: (Hey guys. What's goin' on?)

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: Oh, hey Kenny.

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: Dude, where have you been?

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: (Oh, I've just been hanging out.)

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: Well come on! We gotta tell you what happened. I'm sure glad it's over with.

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: Yeah, but I feel like things are finally back to normal.

title: RED SLEIGH DOWN
text: (Yeah.)
